name: requestData(for:options:dataReceivedHandler:completionHandler:)
desc: Requests the underlying data for the specified asset resource, to be delivered asynchronously.
declaration:
func requestData(for resource: PHAssetResource, 
         options: PHAssetResourceRequestOptions?, 
dataReceivedHandler handler: @escaping (Data) -> Void, 
completionHandler: @escaping (Error?) -> Void) -> PHAssetResourceDataRequestID
